document_data.name: Tathlosar Brimmerbold
document_data.Activities: Tathlosar lead the [[Ready House of the Right Strong Hand]] temple.
document_data.History: Tathlosar and his troops destroyed much larger armies from [[Darkhold]].
document_data.Personality: Tathlosar believed that civilization could survive only if people fought for it. He had contingency plans for any situation. After a brief look to the battlefield he could discern the enemy's plans and possible maneuvers.
document_data.Rumors: Rumors said that Tathlosar was a great womanizer as a younger man.
